last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 1
last_episode_to_air.overview:
‘Dil Ruba’ showcasing the starlet Hania Aamir as ‘Sanam’ – a TikTok star being chased by a variety of young men – hit the internet. While it’s episodes appear fun the plot breaks silence on a major reality-based matter that we all as a society need to talk about. The audience will surely learn a lot from Dil Ruba.

Momina Duraid Productions presents Dil Ruba on HUM TV.
